From: "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@...>

Ignatius sat back laughing, his next move didn't matter if he was tangled up
or not. "YOU KNOW WHAT TO DO." The computer hummed back to life acrivateing
a repulsor field around the base forceing the giant scorpion from it's hull
and resetting the variable shields. Not more than a second later the room
glowed yellow magnetizing the floor and containing the entire room with a
Stasis field making ANY movement from the intruders IMPOSSIBLE.

Lets see here, I just caught Cygnar, Cyanide, Killfest, Halucinagen, The
Destrocons, Drillbit,

I sent Yan a message yesterday with my plans (Thanks for playing along)
Making this perfectly legal. Besides if  the Violator can have all that
power then I can have a trap.
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 9:33 PM
Subject: Re: ATTACK!


> Ok, having the base fly in for a flashy entrance was one thing, but using
it this much in battle is quickly turning into a violation of the mobile
base rule. Can you please have it land somewhere soon?
>
> ::Killfest/Scyther/EndBringer/Demise/Incarcinator::
>
> Killfest makes his way through the corridors after they open for the
attackers, emerging at the ruined bridge and seeing the comotion. He aims
his missile launchers up at the scorpion bot and fires two missiles at him,
sending a transmission to his troops.
>
> "My troops are on their way," he says to Cygnar as his missile launcher
reloads.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> In the bridge of the Blackfortress, Scyther suddenly jumps up as he
recieves an order from Killfest, bolting from the room.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> EndBringer follows Prebon and the other bot a bit behind for a while, but
then a transmission from Killfest interrups him, and he takes off toward the
exit of the Blackfortress.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Emerging from the CR chamber, Incarcinator groans upon recieving
Killfest's message. "One battle after another.."
>
> He walks out of the base, flying off toward the Trainer base.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Demise looks up at Starscream, burping a bit. "I'm fine." His eyes
suddenly light up. "Battle! I must go."
>
> He gets back to his feet and runs out of the room as fast as his four
appendages could carry him, thankful for Killfest's orders to get some
battle in.
>
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> > > :::The Destrocons:::
> > >
> > > ::they land near where Cygnar and Cyanide are standing::
> > > Ramjet: Hey, we got here first. And we've been planning this for
> > even longer.
> > > The Trainers belong to the Destrons.
> > > ::he looks to Cygnar::
> > > Ramjet: What should we do?
> >
> > As the Destrocons land near Cyanide, the Violator drops in altitude
> > and reactivates its shields, hving lowered them when Skywarp had
> > taken the scorpion tank. The ship then flys above the Destrocons and
> > 3 laser cannons lock onto each of them. Inside the ship the floor
> > opens and Gemini 1 and two step out and hover in the air between the
> > shield and the ship. The scorpion tank then aims at the Destrocons
> > with all of its weapons.
> >
> > Skywarp: "These "trainers" belong to us. Get in our way and you die."
>
>
